official_title: Phase I Study of Autologous Lymphocyte Infusions After Radiation Therapy to Mitigate Radiation Induced Lymphopenia and Enhance Immune Reconstitution in Patients With Solid Tumor Malignancies
inclusion_criteria:
Histologically or cytologically documented NSCLC or esophageal cancers Stage II-IVA disease where definitive chemoradiation is the standard of care Age 18
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria: Prior radiotherapy to the chest Life expectancy<6 months Any systemic therapy, aside from standard of care immunotherapy, that is planned to be administered prior to 6 weeks after ALI. Pregnancy
